What are the genetic changes related to pyridoxal 5'-phosphate-dependent epilepsy ?,"Mutations in the PNPO gene cause pyridoxal 5'-phosphate-dependent epilepsy. The PNPO gene provides instructions for producing an enzyme called pyridoxine 5'-phosphate oxidase. Thi
